languages.text: {n}Исполнение малопонятной Процедуры 0-Х было запрещено. Искореняя ее директивы и извлекая магосов из камер, слуги Вольного Торговца столкнулись с сопротивлением, не обошлось без жертв.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Исполнение малопонятной Процедуры 0-Х было запрещено. Искореняя ее директивы и извлекая магосов из камер, слуги Вольного Торговца столкнулись с сопротивлением, не обошлось без жертв.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Исполнение малопонятной Процедуры 0-Х было запрещено. Искореняя ее директивы и извлекая магосов из камер, слуги Вольного Торговца столкнулись с сопротивлением, не обошлось без жертв.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-Х was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the chambers, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, which resulted in bloodshed and death.{/n}

{n}Much to the displeasure of tech-priests, the Rogue Trader banned the execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-Х. While rooting out is directives, the Rogue Trader's servants managed to learn a few craft secrets from the cyber-smiths of antiquity.{/n}

{n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-Х was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the chambers, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, which resulted in bloodshed and death.{/n}

languages.text: {n}无法理解的0-C程序遭到了禁止。行商浪人的仆人努力根除这个程序发布的指令，将所有贤者赶出房间。行动期间遭遇了抵抗，导致了部分人员伤亡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无法理解的0-C程序遭到了禁止。行商浪人的仆人努力根除这个程序发布的指令，将所有贤者赶出房间。行动期间遭遇了抵抗，导致了部分人员伤亡。{/n}
{n}无法理解的0-C程序遭到了禁止。行商浪人的仆人努力根除这个程序发布的指令，将所有贤者赶出房间。行动期间遭遇了抵抗，导致了部分人员伤亡。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se prohibió la ejecución del desconocido Procedimiento 0-C. En sus esfuerzos por erradicar sus directrices y expulsar a los magos de las celdas, los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente encontraron resistencia, lo que causó derramamientos de sangre y muertes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se prohibió la ejecución del desconocido Procedimiento 0-C. En sus esfuerzos por erradicar sus directrices y expulsar a los magos de las celdas, los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente encontraron resistencia, lo que causó derramamientos de sangre y muertes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あまり理解されていないプロシージャー0-Cの実行は禁止された。その指令を根絶やしにし、賢人をセルから追い出そうと彼らが尽力する中、ローグトレーダーの従者は抵抗され、その結果犠牲を出すことになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あまり理解されていないプロシージャー0-Xの実行は禁止された。その指令を根絶やしにし、賢人を部屋から追い出そうと彼らが尽力する中、ローグトレーダーの従者は抵抗され、その結果犠牲を出すことになった。{/n}
{n}あまり理解されていないプロシージャー0-Cの実行は禁止された。その指令を根絶やしにし、賢人を部屋から追い出そうと彼らが尽力する中、ローグトレーダーの従者は抵抗され、その結果犠牲を出すことになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'exécution de la Procédure 0-C, encore fort mal comprise, est frappée d'interdiction. Alors qu'ils tentent d'éradiquer ses instructions et d'extirper les magi de leurs cellules, les serviteurs se voient opposer une résistance farouche, qui occasionne des affrontements sanglants et des morts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'exécution de la Procédure 0-C, encore fort mal comprise, est frappée d'interdiction. Alors qu'ils tentent d'éradiquer ses instructions et d'extirper les magi de leurs cellules, les serviteurs se voient opposer une résistance farouche, qui occasionne des affrontements sanglants et des morts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Ausführung der kaum erforschten Prozedur 0-C wurde verboten. Bei ihren Bemühungen, die Direktiven der Prozedur zu löschen und die Magi aus den Zellen zu entfernen, trafen die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf schweren Widerstand. Es kam zu Blutvergießen und Tod.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Ausführung der kaum erforschten Prozedur 0-C wurde verboten. Bei ihren Bemühungen, die Direktiven der Prozedur zu löschen und die Magi aus den Zellen zu entfernen, trafen die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf schweren Widerstand. Es kam zu Blutvergießen und Tod.{/n}

{n}Die Ausführung der kaum erforschten Prozedur 0-C wurde verboten. Bei ihren Bemühungen, die Direktiven der Prozedur zu löschen und die Magi aus den Kammern zu entfernen, trafen die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf schweren Widerstand. Es kam zu Blutvergießen und Tod.{/n}

languages.text: {n}0-C Sayılı Prosedür, teferruatı anlaşılamadığı için yasaklandı. Yönergelerinin kökünü kurutup Magosları hücrelerinden çıkarmak için yürütülen çabalar esnasında Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârları, kan ve ölümle sonuçlanan bir direnişle karşılaştılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Execution of the poorly understood Procedure 0-C was forbidden. In their efforts to root out its directives and remove the Magi from the cells, the Rogue Trader's servants faced resistance, resulting in bloodshed and death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}0-C Sayılı Prosedür, teferruatı anlaşılamadığı için yasaklandı. Yönergelerinin kökünü kurutup Magosları hücrelerinden çıkarmak için yürütülen çabalar esnasında Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârları, kan ve ölümle sonuçlanan bir direnişle karşılaştılar.{/n}
